gobblin.data.management.copy.extractor

Class FileAwareInputStreamExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.data.management.copy.extractor.FileAwareInputStreamExtractor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gobblin.source.extractor.Extractor<java.lang.String,FileAwareInputStream>, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloseableFsFileAwareInputStreamExtractor

    public class FileAwareInputStreamExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
implements gobblin.source.extractor.Extractor<java.lang.String,FileAwareInputStream>
    An implementation of Extractor that extracts InputStreams. This extractor is suitable for copy jobs where files from any source to a sink. The extractor extracts a FileAwareInputStream which encompasses an InputStream and a CopyableFile for every file that needs to be copied.

    In Gobblin Extractor terms, each FileAwareInputStream is a record. i.e one record per copyable file. The extractor is capable of extracting multiple files
